RelatedSentence: Deutsche Bank AG , Germany 's biggest bank , said it sold 60 million shares to the Qatari royal family amid its pursuit to raise as much as 8 billion euros of capital .
Deutsche Bank AG , Germany 's biggest bank , said it sold 60 million shares to the Qatari royal family amid its pursuit to raise as much as 8 billion euros of capital .
The bank raised 1.75 billion euros after selling a share at a price of 29.20 euros , while pledged to gather another 6.3 billion euros in a rights offer next month .
